content:
ERROR:
No replacement was performed, old_str `# Configure CORS with specific allowed origins
allowed_origins = ["http://localhost:8080", "http://127.0.0.1:8080"]
CORS(app, origins=allowed_origins, resources={r"/api/*": {}})` did not appear verbatim in /workspace/SheepVibes/backend/app.py.

extras.old_content:
# Configure CORS with specific allowed origins
allowed_origins = ["http://localhost:8080", "http://127.0.0.1:8080"]
CORS(app, origins=allowed_origins, resources={r"/api/*": {}})
extras.new_content:
# Configure CORS with specific allowed origins
allowed_origins_str = os.environ.get("CORS_ALLOWED_ORIGINS", "http://localhost:8080,http://127.0.0.1:8080")
allowed_origins = [origin.strip() for origin in allowed_origins_str.split(',')]
CORS(app, origins=allowed_origins, resources={r"/api/*": {}})
